gen:link.msg:message: `EmployeeBenefitsExpensesOther` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesOtherDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesOtherDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesOtherCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesOtherCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
